de.javasoft.swing.filter
Interface IRowFilterFactory<M>

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleRowFilterModel.EqualsRowFilterFactory
public interface IRowFilterFactory<M>

IRowFilterFactory is a factory of simple, immutable RowFilters comprised of a single match value and one or more columns.

Method Summary
 javax.swing.RowFilter<? super M,? super java.lang.Integer> createRowFilter(java.lang.Object matchValue, int... columns)
          Creates and returns an immutable RowFilter comprised of the given value and columns.
 

Method Detail

createRowFilter

javax.swing.RowFilter<? super M,? super java.lang.Integer> createRowFilter(java.lang.Object matchValue,
                                                                           int... columns)
Creates and returns an immutable RowFilter comprised of the given value and columns.

Parameters:
matchValue - the value to filter against
columns - the columns to include in the filtering
Returns:
an immutable RowFilter for the given value and indices.
